lead_paragraph: Senator Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts campaigned with Hillary Clinton in Cincinnati, the first event that featured the two Democrats together.

headline.print_headline: Clinton and Warren Take Swings at Trump in First Joint Campaign Event
headline.main: Hillary Clinton and Elizabeth Warren Take Aim at Donald Trump

snippet: Senator Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts campaigned with Hillary Clinton in Cincinnati, the first event that featured the two Democrats together.
abstract: Massachusetts Sen Elizabeth Warren appears alongside presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton at campaign event; Warren, favorite of party's liberal wing and potential running mate, unleashes attacks on Donald J Trump in bid to lend Clinton credibility with working-class voters.
